articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: 2015 The Apprentice winner Joseph got £250,000 investment backing from Lord Sugar to set up plumbing outfit ImpraGas saying he was the 'definition of success...the godfather of business'
articles.content:
Apprentice winner Joseph Valente has become its ­biggest loser after the firm he set up with Alan Sugars help went bust owing almost £2million.
One creditor claimed it ­commissioned work even though… [+2671 chars]

articles.author: Ellie Kirwin-Jones
articles.title: Jeremy Clarkson addresses calling daughter for ‘help’ with new move: 'I didn't understand' - Express
articles.description: JEREMY CLARKSON - who is best known for hosting the Grand Tour and Top Gear with James May and Richard Hammond - has revealed he reached out to one of his daughters for some 'help' with a new project during lockdown.
articles.content: The Grand Tour host Jeremy Clarkson, 60, has said he had to go to one of his daughters for some much-needed guidance with a new project as he didn't "understand" what he had to do. The Top Gear star … [+1995 chars]
